summary: Splash overlay component was added and wired into App, with a pop animation and timed fade/removal plus reduced-motion handling. However, the diff also includes broad, unrequested styling/theme and Tailwind configuration changes, and the fade-out effect is not implemented as a named reusable Tailwind/CSS animation utility.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add Tailwind/CSS animation utilities (keyframes/classes) required for the splash “pop” and “fade out” effects and ensure they don’t conflict with existing fade-in animations used in the hero section.
missing_requirements.reason: A reusable Tailwind/CSS animation utility is added for the pop effect (`splash-pop`), but the splash fade-out is implemented via `transition-opacity duration-1000` plus React state toggling rather than a named/reusable animation utility for the fade-out effect.

hallucinated_features.description: Major global theme/color token changes (OKLCH palette, light/dark adjustments) unrelated to the splash overlay feature.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for a splash overlay and related animation utilities; it does not request a redesign or theme overhaul.

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind configuration extensions for fonts (Poppins), cricket-themed tokens, and glow shadows beyond the requested splash animations.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires adding animation utilities for splash pop/fade; other Tailwind theming additions are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates/additions to non-splash features such as pricing content and a testimonials carousel.
